trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SEQ_00<tab>Ruvoll Ja is reveling in the harvest. ※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SEQ_01<tab>Things could scarcely be better for Gok Golma, and as Ruvoll Ja proudly reports the progress you've made, Anggir reminds him of his dream to produce an original dish from his kitchen. Not only does Ruvoll Ja lack any culinary skill, he is adamant that the new cuisine be made in concert with the people of Iq Br'aax. After some deliberation, he decides to ask your mutual friend Ty'at Roh if he knows any master chefs willing to lend a hand.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SEQ_02<tab>Ty'at Roh recommends an elder named Bol Tst'ei for the job. Once a member of the Brethren of Br'aax, the retiree now spends his time mostly in the kitchen, if not out on errands for exotic ingredients.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SEQ_03<tab>Upon seeing Ruvoll Ja before him, Bol Tst'ei's demeanor instantly cools. A combat veteran who grew up on the war stories of endless, bloody conflict, he is not immediately sympathetic to any Mamool Ja's cause. However, Ruvoll Ja's passionate speech convinces him to at least visit Gok Golma and see for himself the real change at work in Mamook.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SEQ_04<tab>Bol Tst'ei is stunned by the abundant gainery─and by an entreaty from the Autarch himself. The veteran chef pledges his skills to realize a new dish, one made with ingredients from Mamook and Iq Br'aax both. Before beginning, however, he asks you to survey Mamook's citizens, that he may learn more about the Mamool Ja palate.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SEQ_05<tab>From tacos to xibruq pibil, it would seem the people of Mamook enjoy a variety of cuisines. Armed with this new information, you report back to Bol Tst'ei.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SEQ_06<tab>Bol Tst'ei considers his options before sending you off for the ingredients he needs. You venture forth with the knowledge that on the other end of this journey lies the promise of not only potential reconciliation of disparate peoples, but some very delicious food.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SEQ_07<tab>Bol Tst'ei receives his ingredients and sets to work, telling you to get ready for the impending banquet. It would be good of you to invite Anggir, seeing how instrumental she's been to the gainery's success.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SEQ_08<tab>The banquet is held successfully, establishing a newfound understanding between the peoples of Iq Br'aax and Mamook. While some scars may never fade, tomorrow will always offer new avenues of hope, if only one chooses to take that first step forward. With Gok Golma's success, Mamook has proven itself not only capable of change but a champion of it, and you can only anticipate with pride the ever-brighter future of a community that once suffered so greatly.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ty'at Roh.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Bol Tst'ei.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Bol Tst'ei again.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the residents of Mamook.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Bol Tst'ei.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Xd'aa Talat Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Bol Tst'ei)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Xd'aa Talat Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Bol Tst'ei)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Xd'aa Talat Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Bol Tst'ei)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Anggir.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_000<tab>Thanks for all your help around the gainery, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. More crops than ever are thriving under our new lights.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_001<tab>The kitchen has been getting good use as well, and I've heard nothing but glowing reviews of our produce. Dare I ask how the preparation of your “legendary” dish proceeds, Ruvoll Ja?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_002<tab>P-Perfectly! Can't wait to start cooking, in fact.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_003<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>Can<var 1A 01 /var> you cook?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_004<tab>Not at all! In Tuliyollal, I never wanted for places to eat, so I never picked up the habit. You?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_005<tab>If I had the time to develop culinary prowess, I'd rather be researching. As long as it's nutritionally sound, I take little heed of what I eat.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_A1_000_001<tab>So I'm the only chef here?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_A1_000_002<tab>I could theoretically follow a recipe, I suppose...
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_010<tab>A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of many talents, eh? But for the new dish I'm thinking of, we'll need specific help.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_020<tab>Namely, help from the people of Iq Br'aax. To make the next xibruq pibil, their cooperation is paramount.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_21<tab>I was hoping to show them what we've been growing in Gok Golma...

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_023<tab>That's a wonderful idea. Do you have any acquaintances in Iq Br'aax? I understand proactive communication may have been sparse, even in light of the peace accord.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_Q1_100_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_A1_100_001<tab>Ty'at Roh from the Brethren of Br'aax is a friendly sort.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_A1_100_002<tab>I'm sure Hunmu Rruk would be welcoming.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_024<tab>You know Ty'at Roh as well? I met him when the brethren came through on official business. Lovely fellow!

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_025<tab>I-I'm not sure I've got the courage to approach the Xbr'aax Rax directly. Maybe someone a little lower on the chain of command. For instance, there's a fellow named Ty'at Roh who'd lend us a friendly ear. He's always happy to chat when the Brethren of Br'aax visits on business.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_026<tab>Let's see if we can't find him in Iq Br'aax!
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_040<tab>Ruvoll Ja seems even more excited than usual. It would be wonderful if his dream can be realized.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_041<tab>Looks like we caught him on his return from patrol! I'm relieved.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TYATROH_000_050<tab>Ruvoll Ja! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What odd-yet-welcome bedfellows! What can I do for you?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_052<tab>We had something to ask. You know about Gok Golma, right?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_053<tab>I was hoping that we could use the vegetables grown in our gainery to fashion a new sort of cuisine. Together, with Iq Br'aax.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TYATROH_000_054<tab>If it's cuisine you want, talk with Bol Tst'ei. Since retiring from the Brethren of Br'aax, he's become fascinated with cooking.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TYATROH_000_055<tab>He'll even travel all the way to Tuliyollal for ingredients to whip up some new, odd thing. And I'll vouch for the quality─I've enjoyed many a delicious supper from old Bol Tst'ei!
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TYATROH_000_057<tab>I saw him just now on the north side of town. If you hurry, you may be able to catch him!
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_058<tab>Bol Tst'ei... Got it! Thank you, Ty'at Roh.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TYATROH_000_060<tab>According to Bol Tst'ei, there's no greater joy in life than cooking up new dishes. Check the north side of town and see if he's not there cooking, or thinking about cooking, or talking about cooking, or preparing to cook...
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_061<tab>(Bol Tst'ei...Bol Tst'ei... Gods, let me pronounce his name correctly...)
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_070<tab>I know your face, adventurer. But what business have you here, Mamool Ja?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_071<tab>P-Pardon me, sir, but are you Bol Tst'ei? We're looking for a culinary expert, and Ty'at Roh suggested we seek you out...

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_073<tab>We've been growing vegetables in Mamook, you see. Crops of all colors, shapes, and sizes. And we wanted to make a new dish with our produce alongside our friends here in Iq Br'aax.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_074<tab>So you'd have me cook for you? As your “friend”? You speak lightly of what you know little, boy.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_075<tab>I grew up on stories of the old war and know all too well the facade of peace that has poisoned this forest. For years I've watched Mamook shift not an ilm, chasing false dreams of blessed siblings while looking down on us as lessers.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_076<tab>...You're right. I left Mamook for that very reason. I moved to Tuliyollal because I hated my homeland. But when I heard that my people stood on the precipice of change, I remembered how to hope.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_077<tab>If the fruits of our labors can be shared with you─if our communities can make a new dish that puts the past behind us─that, I believe, will serve as real proof. It will be Mamook's first, purposeful step into a bigger, brighter world.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_078<tab>...I suppose having a look at these vegetables couldn't hurt. The company you keep certainly lends credence to your plea.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_079<tab>Thank you, sir. Allow me to escort you to our gainery, Gok Golma.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_090<tab>One step at a time. I have every confidence this will work.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_100<tab>I can hardly believe... I never imagined the Ja Tiika Heartland could offer such yields...
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_101<tab>I was hoping we could combine our ingredients. Crops from our gainery and the bounty from your forests. Just like xibruq pibil was made.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_102<tab>Xibruq pibil? You dream big, boy, I'll give you that.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_103<tab>These crops were first grown for Mamook's own welfare, but I would share them with our Xbr'aal brothers and sisters. I firmly believe that together, our peoples are stronger.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_000_105<tab>(-???-)As do I.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_106<tab>Autarch!?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_000_107<tab>Allow me to humbly beg your assistance as well.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_100_107<tab>I have renounced the old teachings and acknowledge the mistakes of the past. Mamook must make amends. Will you not help us to do so?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_108<tab>If the Autarch himself is asking, I obviously stand in a brand-new Mamook.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_109<tab>Very well. If you wish to join hands with us Xbr'aal, let us feast together once more.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_110<tab>The bounties you have grown here will be reimagined into a dish befitting both our peoples.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_000_111<tab>You have my thanks.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_000_112<tab>And you have done well with this gainery. ...It has given me much to think about regarding Iq Br'aax.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_000_113<tab>Send word once preparations have been made. I should be glad to attend the banquet.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_114<tab>We have our work cut out for us. Let's see this through.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_115<tab>First of all, I'd like to know more about Mamool Ja culinary preferences. Could I ask you to conduct such a survey for me?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_116<tab>If you don't mind, I'll leave you to it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I plan to return to Iq Br'aax.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_117<tab>I'd like to invite as many people as I can to our banquet─including the Xbr'aax Rax, once I pluck up the nerve.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_118<tab>Thank you. If we all work together, I just know we can make this a success!
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_150<tab>Seems like you have a nice kitchen here as well. Let me know when you have an idea as to how I should be using it.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TULIYOLLALHOOBIGO05259_000_160<tab>My favorite food? Well, I couldn't get enough of tacos when I was in Tuliyollal.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TULIYOLLALHOOBIGO05259_000_161<tab>The weight of them in your hand, the satisfaction of biting in... You really felt like you were <var 1A 02 /var>eating<var 1A 01 /var>, you know? And Aunt Tii's signature spice! Mmm...
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_TULIYOLLALHOOBIGO05259_000_162<tab>...Oh, but I'm sure whatever you end up making will also be good! If there's any way I can help, let me know!
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_OLDBOONEWA05259_000_170<tab>Hmm... When I was young, I used to think meat was such a delicacy, but this belly of mine can't tolerate it much anymore.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_OLDBOONEWA05259_000_171<tab>Now I prefer the sweet vegetables we grow in that lovely garden of ours. I'm sure other old folk like myself feel similarly.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_FRIENDLYDOPPRO05259_000_180<tab>My favorite dish is xibruq pibil! It was the talk of the city after the rite of succession.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_FRIENDLYDOPPRO05259_000_181<tab>Not only is the meat delicious, but knowing that our najool leaves play such a crucial role is a point of pride.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_190<tab>You're back. What did you discover?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_191<tab>That's helpful, thank you. With a better understanding of folks' preferences, I believe I know what sort of dish we're looking for...
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_200<tab>But we'll need natural yeast for the bread. Can you bring me some from Xd'aa Talat Tsoly?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_205<tab>But we'll need some Xbr'aal herbs for the right touch. Can you bring me some from Xd'aa Talat Tsoly?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_210<tab>But we'll need some Xbr'aal loach for the marinade. Could you fish me one from Xd'aa Talat Tsoly? They should bite at golden stonefly nymphs.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_220<tab>Good. I'll start preparing the kitchen and other ingredients, so hurry back as soon as you can.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_230<tab>Did you find what we need?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_231<tab>Yes, this'll do nicely. Good work. You can leave the rest of the preparations to me.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_000_232<tab>I imagine Ruvoll Ja will be back soon. If there's anyone else you'd like to invite to the banquet, now would be the time.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_240<tab>Word has it that we're in for quite the feast!
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_241<tab>My role here has been strictly one of research and facilitating the growth of new crops in Mamook.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_252<tab>But it is a joy and honor to know that those very crops will now link two disparate peoples. Shall we go and assist the banquet preparations?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_100_290<tab>Feast your eyes upon Yak T'el's newest creation, the bounty of two forests...
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_100_291<tab>Tiika selvaas!

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_BOLTSTEI_100_292<tab>The Brethren of Br'aax supplied the game, and the farmers of Gok Golma the vegetables. After marinating the meat to juicy perfection, I placed it in soft, fresh bread and prepared a sweet-yet-spicy sauce for those who desire it.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_000_300<tab>...You came.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_000_301<tab>I could hardly refuse Ruvoll Ja's impassioned entreaty, to say nothing of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s presence here today. I am simply fulfilling my duty as Xbr'aax Rax.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_000_302<tab>Even so, I thank you for your attendance...and apologize for the wrongs we have done you.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_000_303<tab>Do you speak of Mamook's rejection of the peace forged by xibruq pibil?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_000_304<tab>Or perhaps the tragic “accident” that befell my daughter sixteen years ago?
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_000_305<tab>...I speak of both.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_000_306<tab>Whether or not our communities join hands is a matter for the next generation to decide.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_000_307<tab>Seeing one and all gathered here today, I have little worry for the future.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_000_308<tab>But some evils can neither be forgotten nor forgiven. Sixteen years ago, an assassin was sent to kill my young daughter. By your order or influence, I know not, but the fact remains.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_100_308<tab>...A sin for which I would forfeit my life, if it would help our peoples choose the path of reconciliation.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_000_309<tab>Forfeiting your life again? I thought you were chided for that after the Feat of the Brotherhood.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_100_309<tab>From what I hear, you were offered friendship and community instead.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_110_309<tab>My daughter would never extend such offers lightly.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_100_309<tab>Your...daughter? You cannot mean...!
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_HUNMURRUK_000_310<tab>You underestimated the vivacity of my little girl. Today of all days, I will speak proudly of her strength and compassion...as her father.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ZEREELJA_000_311<tab>She survived... For this, I am truly grateful.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_312<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_313<tab>Not so long ago, a sight like this would have been inconceivable.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_314<tab>Mamook was never a place we could love. Being born here meant you either adhered to the zealotry of blessed siblings or escaped these forests forever.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_315<tab>But now we have something real to be proud of. We owe so much to you and Anggir.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_317<tab>Hardly. We merely assisted.

TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_ANGGIR_000_318<tab>As I recall, it was because a certain someone eagerly suggested wivres that we were able to establish this gainery in the first place. Your devotion, Ruvoll Ja, garnered the cooperation of myriad peoples, which in turn has made Gok Golma blossom.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_319<tab>Then we need to make sure that each new harvest brings joy to all in this forest.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_RUVOLLJA_000_320<tab>For a Mamook we can love!
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SYSTEM_000_326<tab>With the cooperation of the Xbr'aal and creation of tiika selvaas, relations between Iq Br'aax and Mamook have improved.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SYSTEM_000_327<tab>Unprecedented cheer fills Mamook as her citizens regain pride and love for their homeland, Gok Golma the manifestation of their hopes for a brighter future...
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SYSTEM_000_400<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sworn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the farmers of Gok Golma.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SYSTEM_000_401<tab>You will receive an experience point bonus upon the completion of Mamool Ja society daily quests.
TEXT_BANMAM005_05259_SYSTEM_000_402<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Veerul Ja.
